languages.text: "Не обманывайтесь {mf|его|ее} виду — за взмахом крыла хрупкой бабочки скрывается коварный хищник. Мон-кай перед вами — причудливое средоточие качеств, обычно не присущих {mf|его|ее} слабому роду. {mf|Он|Она} постиг{mf||ла} таинства многих культур этого мира. Тайны вселенной и древних артефактов, тонкое искусство войны, хитросплетения лжи... Все воплотилось в {mf|одном|одной} мон-кай, пускай в это и трудно поверить".

traits.locale_text: "Не обманывайтесь {mf|его|ее} виду — за взмахом крыла хрупкой бабочки скрывается безжалостный тигр. Мон-кай перед вами — уникальное средоточие многих талантов и качеств, присущих {mf|его|ее} слабому роду. {mf|Он|Она} постиг{mf||ла} таинства многих культур этого мира. Тайны вселенной и древних артефактоы, тонкое искусство войны, хитросплетения лжи... Все воплотилось в {mf|одном|одной} мон-кай, пускай в это и трудно поверить".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Do not be deceived by {mf|his|her} breed. There is a cunning predator lurking behind the fluttering of fragile butterfly wings. The mon-keigh before you is a bizarre amalgamation of qualities not usually inherent in {mf|his|her} feeble species. {mf|He|She} has mastered the mysteries of many of this world's cultures. The secrets of the universe and ancient artefacts, the fine art of war, the intricacies of deceit... All are embodied in a single mon-keigh, however hard it may be to believe."
languages.original_text: "Не обманывайтесь {mf|его|ее} виду — за взмахом крыла хрупкой бабочки скрывается коварный хищник. Мон-кай перед вами — причудливое средоточие качеств, обычно не присущих {mf|его|ее} слабому роду. {mf|Он|Она} постиг{mf||ла} таинства многих культур этого мира. Тайны вселенной и древних артефактов, тонкое искусство войны, хитросплетения лжи... Все воплотилось в {mf|одном|одной} мон-кай, пускай в это и трудно поверить".

traits.locale_text: "Do not be deceived by {mf|his|her} look — there is a cunning predator hiding behind the beating of a fragile butterfly's wings. The mon-keigh before you is a bizarre amalgamation of qualities not usually inherent in {mf|his|her} feeble species. {mf|He|She} mastered the mysteries of many of this world's cultures. The secrets of the universe and ancient artefacts, the fine art of war, the intricacies of deceit... All are embodied in a single mon-keigh, however hard it may be to believe."

The secrets of the universe and ancient artefacts, the fine art of war, the intricacies of deceit... All are embodied in a single mon-keigh, however hard it may be to believe."

traits.locale_text: "Do not be deceived by {mf|his|her} breed. There is a cunning predator lurking behind the fluttering of fragile butterfly wings. The mon-keigh before you is a bizarre amalgamation of qualities not usually inherent in {mf|his|her} feeble species. {mf|He|She} has mastered the mysteries of many of this world's cultures. The secrets of the universe and ancient artefacts, the fine art of war, the intricacies of deceit... All are embodied in a single mon-keigh, however hard it may be to believe."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Ne vous laissez pas tromper par son ascendance. Derrière les battements d'ailes d'un fragile papillon se cache {mf|un prédateur rusé|une prédatrice rusée}. {mf|Le|La} mon-keigh qui se tient devant vous est un étrange amalgame de qualités peu courantes au sein de son espèce fragile.{mf|Il|Elle}... a percé les mystères de nombreuses cultures de ce monde. Les secrets de l'univers et d'antiques artefacts, l'art de la guerre, les subtilités de la ruse... Tout ceci incarné dans {mf|un seul|une seule} et même mon-keigh, aussi incroyable que cela puisse paraître. »
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived by {mf|his|her} breed. There is a cunning predator lurking behind the fluttering of fragile butterfly wings. The mon-keigh before you is a bizarre amalgamation of qualities not usually inherent in {mf|his|her} feeble species. {mf|He|She} has mastered the mysteries of many of this world's cultures. The secrets of the universe and ancient artefacts, the fine art of war, the intricacies of deceit... All are embodied in a single mon-keigh, however hard it may be to believe."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous laissez pas tromper par son apparence. Derrière les battements d'ailes d'un fragile papillon se cache {mf|un prédateur rusé|une prédatrice rusée}. {Mf|Le|La} mon-keigh qui se tient devant vous est un étrange amalgame de qualités peu courantes au sein de son espèce fragile.{mf|Il|Elle}... a percé les mystères de nombreuses cultures de ce monde. Les secrets de l'univers et d'antiques artefacts, l'art de la guerre, les subtilités de la ruse... Tout ceci incarné dans {mf|un seul|une seule} et même mon-keigh, aussi incroyable que cela puisse paraître. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “不要被{mf|他|她}的种族欺骗。尽管{mf|他|她}看起来不过是柔弱的蝴蝶，但{mf|他|她}实际上却是个狡猾的掠食者。你们面前的这只猴子非常特别，{mf|他|她}并没有被物种固有的脆弱束缚。{mf|他|她}精通这个世界上无数文明的奥秘，了解宇宙的秘密、古老的造物、战争的艺术，以及错综复杂的欺骗……尽管这很难令人相信，但这只猴子正是如此。”
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived by {mf|his|her} breed. There is a cunning predator lurking behind the fluttering of fragile butterfly wings. The mon-keigh before you is a bizarre amalgamation of qualities not usually inherent in {mf|his|her} feeble species. {mf|He|She} has mastered the mysteries of many of this world's cultures. The secrets of the universe and ancient artefacts, the fine art of war, the intricacies of deceit... All are embodied in a single mon-keigh, however hard it may be to believe."

traits.locale_text: “不要被{mf|他|她}的外表欺骗。尽管{mf|他|她}看起来不过是柔弱的蝴蝶，但{mf|他|她}实际上却是个狡猾的掠食者。你们面前的这只猴子非常特别，{mf|他|她}并没有被物种固有的脆弱束缚。{mf|他|她}精通这个世界上无数文明的奥秘，了解宇宙的秘密、古老的造物、战争的艺术，以及错综复杂的欺骗……尽管这很难令人相信，但这只猴子正是如此。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「{mf|彼|彼女}の種族に惑わされてはいけない。か弱げな蝶の羽ばたきの背後には、狡猾な捕食者が潜んでいるのだ。あなたの目の前にいるモン＝ケイには、その貧弱な種にしては通常見られない資質が奇妙にも複数備わっている。{mf|彼|彼女}はこの世界の多くの文化の謎を解き明かした。宇宙や古代のアーティファクトの秘密、高度な戦争の技術、複雑な欺瞞…。どれほど信じがたくても、それらすべてが一人のモン＝ケイの中に具現化されている」
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived by {mf|his|her} breed. There is a cunning predator lurking behind the fluttering of fragile butterfly wings. The mon-keigh before you is a bizarre amalgamation of qualities not usually inherent in {mf|his|her} feeble species. {mf|He|She} has mastered the mysteries of many of this world's cultures. The secrets of the universe and ancient artefacts, the fine art of war, the intricacies of deceit... All are embodied in a single mon-keigh, however hard it may be to believe."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|彼|彼女}の種族に惑わされてはいけない。か弱げな蝶の羽ばたきの背後には、狡猾な捕食者が潜んでいるのだ。あなたの目の前にいるモン＝ケイには、その貧弱な種にしては通常見られない資質が奇妙にも複数備わっている。{mf|彼|彼女}はこの世界の多くの文化の謎を解き明かした。宇宙や古代のアーティファクトの秘密、高度な戦争の技術、複雑な欺瞞…。どれほど信じがたくても、それらすべてが一人のモン＝ケイの中に具現化されている」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Lasst Euch nicht von {mf|seiner|ihrer} Herkunft täuschen. Hinter dem Flattern eines zerbrechlichen Schmetterlings lauert ein gerissenes Raubtier. {mf|Der|Die} Chem-Pan-Sey vor Euch zeigt eine bizarre Verschmelzung bestimmter Eigenschaften, die {mf|seiner|ihrer} schwachen Spezies typischerweise nicht eigen sind. {mf|Er|Sie} hat sich die Mysterien vieler Kulturen dieser Welt angeeignet. Die Geheimnisse des Universums und uralte Artefakte, die hohe Kunst des Krieges, die Komplexität der Täuschung ... Sie alle werden verkörpert durch {mf|einen einzigen|eine einzige} Chem-Pan-Sey, auch wenn das nur schwierig zu begreifen ist."
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived by {mf|his|her} breed. There is a cunning predator lurking behind the fluttering of fragile butterfly wings. The mon-keigh before you is a bizarre amalgamation of qualities not usually inherent in {mf|his|her} feeble species. {mf|He|She} has mastered the mysteries of many of this world's cultures. The secrets of the universe and ancient artefacts, the fine art of war, the intricacies of deceit... All are embodied in a single mon-keigh, however hard it may be to believe."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst Euch nicht von {mf|seinem|ihrem} Aussehen täuschen. Hinter dem Flattern eines zerbrechlichen Schmetterlings lauert ein gerissenes Raubtier. {mf|Der|Die} Chem-Pan-Sey vor Euch zeigt eine bizarre Verschmelzung bestimmter Eigenschaften, die {mf|seiner|ihrer} schwachen Spezies typischerweise nicht eigen sind. {mf|Er|Sie} hat sich die Mysterien der vielen Kulturen auf dieser Welt angeeignet. Die Geheimnisse des Universums und uralte Artefakte, die hohe Kunst des Krieges, die Komplexität der Täuschung ... Sie alle werden verkörpert durch {mf|einen einzigen|eine einzige} Chem-Pan-Sey, auch wenn das nur schwierig zu begreifen ist."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No os dejéis engañar por su aspecto. Bajo el aleteo de las frágiles alas de una mariposa acecha un astuto depredador. {mf|El|La} mon-keigh que tenéis ante vosotros posee una insólita amalgama de cualidades que no son inherentes a su patética especie. Ha dominado los misterios de muchas culturas de este mundo. Los secretos del universo y de sus antiguos artefactos, el sofisticado arte de la guerra, los entresijos del engaño... Todo ello encarnado en {mf|un solo|una sola} mon-keigh, por difícil que resulte de creer».
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived by {mf|his|her} breed. There is a cunning predator lurking behind the fluttering of fragile butterfly wings. The mon-keigh before you is a bizarre amalgamation of qualities not usually inherent in {mf|his|her} feeble species. {mf|He|She} has mastered the mysteries of many of this world's cultures. The secrets of the universe and ancient artefacts, the fine art of war, the intricacies of deceit... All are embodied in a single mon-keigh, however hard it may be to believe."

traits.locale_text: «No os dejéis engañar por su aspecto. Bajo el aleteo de las frágiles alas de una mariposa acecha un astuto depredador. {mf|El|La} mon-keigh que tenéis ante vosotros posee una insólita amalgama de cualidades que no son inherentes a su patética especie. Ha dominado los misterios de muchas culturas de este mundo. Los secretos del universo y de sus antiguos artefactos, el sofisticado arte de la guerra, los entresijos del engaño... Todo ello encarnado en {mf|un solo|una sola} mon-keigh, por difícil que resulte de creer».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Türü sizi yanıltmasın. O çırpınan, kırılgan kelebek kanatlarının arkasında sinsi bir yırtıcı kol geziyor. Karşınızdaki mon-keigh, kırılgan türünde genellikle bulunmayan birçok tuhaf özelliğin bir karışımıdır. Bu dünyadaki birçok kültürün gizemlerinde uzmanlaşmıştır. Evrenin ve kadim eserlerin sırları, savaş sanatı, aldatma sanatı... İnanması her ne kadar zor olsa da hepsi tek bir mon-keigh'de toplanmıştır."
languages.original_text: "Do not be deceived by {mf|his|her} breed. There is a cunning predator lurking behind the fluttering of fragile butterfly wings. The mon-keigh before you is a bizarre amalgamation of qualities not usually inherent in {mf|his|her} feeble species. {mf|He|She} has mastered the mysteries of many of this world's cultures. The secrets of the universe and ancient artefacts, the fine art of war, the intricacies of deceit... All are embodied in a single mon-keigh, however hard it may be to believe."

traits.locale_text: "Dâhil olduğu tür sizi yanıltmasın. O çırpınan, kırılgan kelebek kanatlarının arkasında kol gezen sinsi bir yırtıcı var. Karşınızdaki mon-keigh, kırılgan türünde genellikle bulunmayan birçok tuhaf özelliğin bir karışımıdır. Bu dünyadaki birçok kültürün gizemlerinde uzmanlaşmıştır. Evrenin ve kadim eserlerin sırları, savaş sanatı, aldatma sanatı... İnanması her ne kadar zor olsa da hepsi tek bir mon-keigh'de toplanmıştır."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
